about.description:
An Apache 2.0 NLP research library, built on PyTorch, for developing state-of-the-art
deep learning models on a wide variety of linguistic tasks.
about.summary: An open-source NLP research library, built on PyTorch.

about.description:
An Apache 2.0 NLP research library, built on PyTorch, for developing state-of-the-art
deep learning models on a wide variety of linguistic tasks.
about.summary: An open-source NLP research library, built on PyTorch.

name: allennlp

about.description:
An Apache 2.0 NLP research library, built on PyTorch, for developing state-of-the-art
deep learning models on a wide variety of linguistic tasks.
about.summary: An open-source NLP research library, built on PyTorch.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.5.0" %}

{% set spacy_model = "en_core_web_sm" %}

package:
  name: allennlp
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://github.com/allenai/allennlp/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 938c7a1cecfa21023c81f7ddb0d746721bdadc9f9bd7f0b428055b8eb75a53bd
    patches:
      # upstream expectes the folders /tests & /test_fixtures to be relative
      # to the finished package, even though those folders are not packaged;
      # effectively, the upstream test suite can currently only be run in (their)
      # development mode, so patch it that we can properly test the package here.
      - patches/0001-patch-AllenNlpTestCase-so-that-test-suite-can-be-run.patch
      - patches/0002-look-for-README-in-packaging-compatible-location.patch

build:
  entry_points:
    - allennlp=allennlp.__main__:run
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv
  skip: true  # [win or py<36]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - sysroot_linux-64 ==2.17   # [linux64]
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    # see https://github.com/allenai/allennlp/blame/v{{ version }}/setup.py
    - boto3 >=1.14,<2.0
    - checklist =0.0.11
    # debug due to conda-forge/typer-feedstock#5
    - click <7.2
    - dataclasses               # [py<37]
    - filelock >=3.0,<3.1
    - google-cloud-storage >=1.38.0,<1.39.0
    - h5py
    - huggingface_hub >=0.0.8
    - jsonnet >=0.10.0          # [not win]
    - jsonpickle
    - python-lmdb
    - more-itertools
    - nltk
    - numpy
    - overrides ==3.1.0
    - pytorch >=1.6.0,<1.9.0
    - requests >=2.18
    - scikit-learn
    - scipy
    - sentencepiece
    - spacy >=2.1.0,<3.1
    - tensorboardx >=1.2
    - termcolor =1.1.*
    - torchvision >=0.8.1,<0.10.0
    - tqdm >=4.19
    - transformers >=4.1,<4.7
    - wandb >=0.10,<0.11

test:
  requires:
    - flaky
    - matplotlib
    - pytest
    - responses >=0.12.1
    - spacy-model-{{ spacy_model }}
  source_files:
    - tests/
    - test_fixtures/
    # needed by one of the tests
    - README.md
  commands:
    - python -m spacy link {{ spacy_model }} {{ spacy_model }}
    - allennlp test-install
    - pytest tests/ -v
  imports:
    - allennlp
    - allennlp.commands
    - allennlp.common
    - allennlp.common.testing
    - allennlp.data
    - allennlp.data.dataset_readers
    - allennlp.data.dataset_readers.dataset_utils
    - allennlp.data.fields
    - allennlp.data.samplers
    - allennlp.data.token_indexers
    - allennlp.data.tokenizers
    - allennlp.models
    - allennlp.modules
    - allennlp.modules.attention
    - allennlp.modules.matrix_attention
    - allennlp.modules.seq2seq_encoders
    - allennlp.modules.seq2vec_encoders
    - allennlp.modules.span_extractors
    - allennlp.modules.text_field_embedders
    - allennlp.modules.token_embedders
    - allennlp.nn
    - allennlp.nn.regularizers
    - allennlp.predictors
    - allennlp.tools
    - allennlp.training
    - allennlp.training.learning_rate_schedulers
    - allennlp.training.metrics
    - allennlp.training.momentum_schedulers

about:
  home: https://allennlp.org/
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: An open-source NLP research library, built on PyTorch.
  description: |
    An Apache 2.0 NLP research library, built on PyTorch, for developing state-of-the-art 
    deep learning models on a wide variety of linguistic tasks.
  doc_url: https://allenai.github.io/allennlp-docs/
  dev_url: https://github.com/allenai/allennlp

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - CurtLH
    - sodre
    - h-vetinari
    - dirkgr
